definitions.text: horny plate covering and protecting part of the dorsal surface of the digits
a thin pointed piece of metal that is hammered into materials as a fastener
a former unit of length for cloth equal to 1/16 of a yard
attach something somewhere by means of nails
examples: nail the board onto the wall
the police nabbed the suspected criminals
He nailed down a spot at Harvard
You will pass with flying colors
can you pinpoint the position of the enemy?
The chemists could not nail the identity of the chromosome
